dict.acceptation: 民意调查；投票选举；投票数；头部；
得到（一定数目的）选票；对…进行调查；修剪；修剪；

sent.orig: The central poll loop does not scale well to large numbers of threads.
sent.trans: 核心的poll循环在线程数目很大的情况下的扩展性不是很好。

sent.orig: This time, however, poll after poll confirms that the public has switched.
sent.trans: 然而这次，多次的民意调查都已经核实公众舆论有了转变。

sent.orig: In poll after poll a clear majority has supported tightening controls.
sent.trans: 在一项民意测验中，支持加紧控制的意见是明显的多数派。

sent.orig: I have paid no poll-tax for six years.
sent.trans: 我已经有六年没有交纳人头税了。

sent.orig: Scores were killed and observers pronounced it the most fraudulent poll they had witnessed.
sent.trans: 数十人被杀死，观察员声称这是他们看到的最不诚实的选举。
